About.Name: Brennan LeBlanc
About.AboutText: Hi, I am Brennan LeBlanc. I am a computer science student at Seattle Pacific University. I have an interest in software development and cybersecurity. I am currently obtaining my Security+ certification from CompTIA. I enjoy problems that challenge me, and I like to learn constantly.

Experience.ExperienceText: I started to code at Seattle Pacific University. I am going into my senior year and have experience in C++, Data Structures, Concepts in Programming, Algorithms, and Computer Architecture.
Experience.EducationText: Use this to add some narrative to your education section
Experience.EmploymentText: In the summer of 2023, I worked as a Cybersecurity Analyst Intern for Strategic Alliance Consulting. Summer of 2024, I am working for Prisidio as a Cybersecurity Intern.
